text: Butter chicken is an South Asian food. It is made by cooking pieces of tandoori chicken in a sauce made with tomatoes, butter and spices. The food was invented at a restaurant in Old Delhi founded by two Punjabi refugees who fled Peshawar, British India during the Partition of India in 1947. ==References== Category:Indian food Category:Chicken as food Category:Pakistani food Category:Tomato dishes
title: Butter chicken
